description: One Musicfest announces replacement for Cardi B
title: One Musicfest announces replacement for Cardi B
title_page: One Musicfest announces replacement  for Cardi B
text:
The recent announcement by Cardi B that she was dropping off the Bruno Mars tour to tend to her new baby also applies her scheduled performance at the One Musicfest.
The event, which takes place Sept. 8-9 in Atlantaâ€™s Central Park, will no longer feature the popular rapper. Her slot has been filled by 2 Chainz, who will join fellow Atlantans T.I. and Jeezy on a bill also boasting Nas, Miguel, Big Sean, H.E.R., Common, Brandy and many more.
Tickets to the festival are $125 for a two-day general admission pass (the price jumps to $140 after Sept. 2); $250 for a two-day VIP pass; and $750 for a two-day platinum pass.
For more information and to purchase tickets, visit www.onemusicfest.com.
Follow the AJC Music Scene on Facebook and Twitter.
